subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Gregory Havret of France birdied the last hole for a four-under-par 69 and a one-stroke lead over Anthony Wall of Britain after three rounds of the Johnnie Walker Championship in Gleneagles, Scotland. He had an 11-under 208 total. Colin Montgomerie, trying to earn a wild-card berth for the Ryder Cup, shot a 76 and was 12 shots back.
